name: Sudoku mini HD
description:
Just when you thought Sudoku mini/maxi for iPad was super-versatile enough, we've made it even better!

Puzzle through our new alphabet board offering a new and challenging twist. Or stick with the classic Sudoku board.

And remember, with Sudoku mini/maxi for iPad, you never have to buy new boards — an 'infinite' number for your gaming pleasure. And our apps are always Ads-Free!


Curious about Sudoku but feel intimidated? Then Maxi-Sudoku mini for iPad is just for you! It was designed for the casual puzzle gamer! And with each game freshly crafted to optimize your playing experience!

Design of Maxi-Sudoku emulates sleek interface of Apple iPhones, iPods or computers. Maxi-Sudoku game screens contain only what's essential to solve Sudoku puzzles.

Maxi-Sudoku comes with 6 Sudoku flavors, ranging from the elementary 2x2 to the usual 3x3 square grids. Inbetween are versatile games of 2x3, 3x2, 2x4, and 4x2 squares. With our proprietary algorithm to always create a new and enjoyable game to play, Maxi-Sudoku can satisfy whims and fancies of players of all ages and skills.

3x3 game has the same "Easy" level of our other popular Sudoku app, SuperDoKu for iPhone/iPad. If you enjoy Maxi-Sudoku mini and feel like testing your 3x3 skills against "Medium" and "Hard" levels, by all means check out Super SuperDoKu for iPad, crafted with the same exacting details and care and with games to match your desired difficulty levels.

Maxi-Sudoku always picks up where you've last left off during your play. For your amusement, your solving time will be tracked whenever a game is solved without the "Solve" feature.

The "Hint" and "Crib" features will assist you like an expert Sudoku master at your side. You may find those suggestions and pencil-markings a great learning experience to sharpen your playing skills.

The "Solve" and "Undo" features show in animation sequence how a game can be solved and back-tracked, but can be stopped any time by tapping any cells or buttons to resume your own play. Each empty cell can also be tapped multiple times to gradually narrow down its valid choice.

If you enjoy playing our intelligently crafted Sudoku apps, please visit our popular iPhone Fishies or iPad iFishies app that lets you play with a school of fish swimming in coral reef.
